*Douglas Baird (Indian Army officer) (Harry Beauchamp Douglas Baird, 1877–1963), British Army officer

Douglas Gordon Baird (born July 10, 1953) is an American legal scholar, the Harry A. Bigelow Distinguished Service Professor and a former dean of the University of Chicago Law School. He joined the faculty in 1980 and served as the dean from 1994-1999.Douglas Baird faculty page He is a leader in the field of bankruptcy law.
